name: Content Marketing Campaign
description: Plan and execute a content marketing campaign from research through promotion and analysis

steps.name: Audience Research
steps.description: Research the target audience: demographics, pain points, content preferences, and where they spend time online. Analyze competitor content and identify gaps.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Audience persona documented, competitor analysis complete, content gap opportunities identified

steps.name: Content Strategy & Outline
steps.description: Define the campaign theme, key messages, content formats (blog, social, email, video), and distribution channels. Create a content calendar with topics and deadlines.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Content strategy document with themes, formats, channels, and a 4-week content calendar

steps.name: Draft Content
steps.description: Write the first drafts of all content pieces. Focus on value delivery, storytelling, and clear calls to action. Include SEO keywords naturally where applicable.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All content pieces drafted, key messages conveyed, SEO keywords included, CTAs present

steps.name: Edit & Refine
steps.description: Review all drafts for clarity, tone consistency, grammar, and factual accuracy. Optimize headlines, subheadings, and meta descriptions. Add visual suggestions.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All content polished, tone consistent across pieces, headlines optimized, no grammatical errors

steps.name: Publish & Schedule
steps.description: Format content for each platform. Schedule posts according to the content calendar. Set up tracking links and UTM parameters for attribution.
steps.acceptance_criteria: All content published or scheduled, tracking links configured, calendar events created

steps.name: Promote & Distribute
steps.description: Execute the promotion plan: social media sharing, email newsletter, community posting, outreach to influencers or partners, and paid promotion if budgeted.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Content shared across all planned channels, outreach emails sent, paid campaigns launched if applicable

steps.name: Analyze & Report
steps.description: After 1-2 weeks, collect performance metrics: views, engagement, shares, conversions, and SEO rankings. Compare against goals. Document learnings for the next campaign.
steps.acceptance_criteria: Performance report with metrics, comparison to goals, and actionable insights for next campaign
